SUB_C01_GMCK_SIUG_EMERALDRIDE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_GMCK_SIUG_EMERALDRIDE_000_CUT_00.text:
An inferior life-form—and yet, I feel as
though I have seen this somewhere before. 
Is it a member of my thrall, perhaps?
Or an enemy I once fought?

SUB_C01_GMCK_SIUG_EMERALDRIDE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_GMCK_SIUG_EMERALDRIDE_000_CUT_00.text:
You again, inferior life-form?
What is it this time?

SUB_C01_GMCK_SIUG_TRADEDRUM_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_GMCK_SIUG_TRADEDRUM_000_CUT_000_.text:
Who put this thing here? It looks
like a trap—one which compels you
to touch it.

SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Oh boy. Oooh boy. Is this what
it's like outside of the Kosmos? Please, Canker! Pinch my cellular wall
and wake me from this horrid nightmare!
I don't want to be alone here!

SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.text:
What are you doing here, blob?
Did you take care of Canker?

SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Foreign body detected! Oh, thank goodness!
Well, I have no use for Canker anymore.
Aaaaaand away you go!

SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Now let us sally forth together!
You and I will need to get used to
being in the same boat, as it were.

SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
To think such a place lay beyond this door.
Ah, but I suppose infinite portals would
lead off to infinite worlds.

SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
I feel as though I have seen this place
before—and that I have ventured through
these doors times beyond counting.

SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text:
You are familiar with this
place then, Philosopher?

SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Do you mean to suggest you
are not, my dear Count!?

SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.text: I believe we have made a terrible, terrible mistake.

SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_05.text:
Allay your fears; we will find
our door soon enough.

SUB_C01_SCAN_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_SCAN_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text: So the door is mine to choose, is it?

SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Though meager it may be, my power has grown.
I am pleased that venturing through that world
was not the waste of time I feared it to be.

SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
I now have powerful servants under my sway
in the form of this warrior band. As such,
the time is nigh for me to return to my throne.

SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
I now have powerful servants under my sway
in the form of this warrior band. As such,
the time is nigh for me to return to my throne. And yet, is there any point
in my clinging to such?

SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
A journey to unleash the darkness of my warrior
band sounds positively delightful. Should any
among them awaken to their inner darkness,
I just might be able to make knights of them.

SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_WRLD_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
I truly hope that an individual deserving
of sanguine gear is found on this journey.

SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Plate
SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.text:
And where do you think you're going?
The Dismal King ought to return to the
Dark Castle—that is the plan.

SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.text:
I go where I please.
Now name yourself, churl!

SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Plate
SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.text:
Who I am does not matter; all that matters is
that you are the Dismal King, he who must spread
the Dismal Myth across the Conjoined Worlds.
And yet, myth must remain in the realm of myth.

SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Plate
SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.text:
But you have done enough. For you see,
I occasionally update the Conjoined Worlds'
shared memory. In doing so, the Conjoined
Worlds' loose sense of unity is maintained.

SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.text:
And you claim my journey with my
warrior band was your plan all along?

SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Plate
SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.text:
At least until your initial encounter, yes. But you have
freedom of will, so I cannot predict how you will act—
not even now. Yet while not all has gone according
to my plan, enough has to satisfy our needs. All that
remains now is for you to return to your dismal land.

SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.text:
So you would send me back to Yomi
by force, if necessary?

SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Plate
SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.text:
Yes, though I would prefer for you to return of
your own will; I'd rather not exert the effort
unless it is absolutely necessary.

SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.text:
The avoidance of exertion is also
according to your 'plan,' is it not? As such, I shall act accordingly—but I will
not be returning to the dismal land! Instead,
I will continue my journey in a new world
beyond that door.

SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Plate
SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.text:
You are the very nuisance I believed you
to be, Dismal King! Alas, I fear we must
keep you under our thumb for the sake
of the Conjoined Worlds' diversity.

SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.text:
Victory is mine. We have earned
the right to move freely.

SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.text: I demand an even more perfect victory!

SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.text:
I want to go to a world where
I can be a true hero!

SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.text:
I'm gonna aim higher—into infinity,
just like Yer Majesty does!

SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.text:
Gotta love all the worlds! Mind unfurled!
Get tied down by one and you're done, son!

SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.text:
So long as there are things to kill
in my future, I will decide what
lives are to be ended.

SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.text:
Will we be taking a tour of endless worlds?
That DOES sound positively titillating—
and yet, imagine the hassle.

SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.text:
Then let us strike out beyond the
guidance of the Emerald Wave!

SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_100.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_100.text: I have achieved victory this day.

SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_100.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_100.text:
And yet, I believe I used perhaps
too much of my power.

SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_100.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_100.text: My future lies beyond that door.

SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_100.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_100.text:
Ah, but I have infinite time and no
need to rush. Rest is required now.

SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_100.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_100.text:
When I awake, I will venture
out beyond the door.
